text: (Another wife who came from Judah was the mother of Jered the father of Gedor, Heber the father of Soco, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah.4:18. “Father”: each refers to the “founder” of the respective towns. See Joshua 15.) These were the sons of Bithiah, Pharaoh's daughter, whom Mered had married.4:18. Presumably referring back to the sons mentioned in the preceding verse.
